channel.title: Help plz <3
channel.description: Ok, so on my server I need to add teleport block otherwise the jail is completely pointless, my server is 508 palidino 76 is there any way I can added teleport block?

item.title: Help plz <3
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Make something like

Public boolean teleblock = false;

then, put something infront of all teleports like,

If (commandEqualsIgnoreCase("Home") && teleblock == false)) { SetID = XXXX; SetID2 = YYYY; } else { sendM("You have been teleblocked!"); }

Read full topic
